bug.author: AlexDBlack
bug.description: This was passing early last week, from what I recall. Tested on CPU/native backend.

comments.comment: it's pretty much the only thing left to merge <denchmark-link:https://github.com/deeplearning4j/deeplearning4j/pull/5026>https://github.com/deeplearning4j/deeplearning4j/pull/5026</denchmark-link> , which I would really like to see in the next release, too.
Max confirmed that his branch conv3D, pooling3d, cropping3d and zeropadding3d all passed grad checks.
This thread has been automatically locked since there has not been any recent activity after it was closed. Please open a new issue for related bugs.
